wiki.summary: “Romantic Homicide” is a relaxing indie track turning out to be about heartbreak where he blames himself for it. D4vd first previewed the track on TikTok on July 18, 2022. wiki.content: “Romantic Homicide” is a relaxing indie track turning out to be about heartbreak where he blames himself for it. D4vd first previewed the track on TikTok on July 18, 2022. He later revealed the song title along with the release date on his Instagram story a day later after it gaining 1.2 million views. After a dead body was found in a Tesla car registered to d4vd in September 2025, many fans realized the eerie connections to the case, with lyrics such as "in the back of my mind, you died, and I didn't even cry" taking on new meaning, suggesting that d4vd himself had actually committed homicide. The body was identified as Celeste Rivas Hernandez, and many listeners were quick to point out the song's music video release date coinciding with Celeste's birthday. Read more on Last.fm.
